snippet.title: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure launches on PlayStation 5 on July 25th!

Find your way in a world of breezy, thoughtful puzzles, along a charming journey of self-discovery.

Gameplay takes place on a unique, interconnected ‘grid’ that spans the entire world, snappily uniting movement, exploration, and combat. The debut game from an all-star development team, featuring the artist behind Braid. 

The world is yours to solve!

#ps5 #ps5games #arranger #summergamefest2024
